name: COUNT DUNK
description:
Controllers:
[ F11 ] - Full Screen (Web Browser)
[ MOUSE ] - User Interface & Buttons
[ LEFT CLICK ] - Drag Basketball Hoop

Part of Junior Programmer Pathway at Unity Learn: Counting Prototype.

The prototype was created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the gameplay.

I challenge you to experience it or even become our coffee machine gun.

All donations will support the near development of new gaming experiences and are shared among contributors.

Stay in touch & support... 🔫 ☕ ;)
